resources.string: "If you enjoy using Heriswap, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!"
"Enable Swarm ×swarm_icon,1,1× to compare your scores with others players!"
"You seem really good.\nWould you like to start a new game with increased difficulty ?"

"The goal is to score the most points.

Aligning at least 3 identical leaves ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1×.

Swap 2 neighbouring leaves ×feuille2,1,1× ×feuille3,1,1× to create a combining and earn points.

Game is time limited.

"

"The ×herisson_2_5,2,1.8× shows how much time is left, and the game is over when it reaches screen's right edge.

The ×feuille5,1,1× on its back scores bonus points.

For each successful combining extra time is added. The best way to earn lot of time is to complete a level. This is done by clearing the top branch of all its leaves."

"The goal is to remove all the leaves ×feuille2,1,1× from the tree as fast as possible.

This is done by aligning at least 3 identical leaves ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1×.

Swap 2 neighbouring leaves ×feuille2,1,1× ×feuille3,1,1× to create a combining.

"
"The ×herisson_2_5,2,1.8× shows the progress. Game is finished when it reaches screen's right edge.\n\nEvery combining using bonus type leaves ×feuille5,1,1× score double."

"The goal is to score the most points in exactly 100 seconds.

The goal is to score the most points.

Aligning at least 3 identical leaves ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1×.

Swap 2 neighbouring leaves ×feuille2,1,1× ×feuille3,1,1× to create a combining and earn points.

"
"The ×herisson_2_5,2,1.8× shows how much time is left, and the game is over when it reaches screen's right edge.\n\nThe ×feuille5,1,1× on its back scores bonus points."
